alcatelIND1MVRPMIB.name: alcatelIND1MVRPMIB

revisions.description: Fixed the Notifications to use MIB Module OID.0 as Notifications root.

The MVRP MIB defines a set of MVRP related management objects for VLANs and ports that support Multiple VLAN Registration Protocol (MVRP). MVRP as a protocol provides mechanisms to dynamically learn and further propagate VLAN membership information across a bridged network, as recommended in standards IEEE Std. 802.1ak-2007, which is an amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2005 Edition. This MVRP MIB extends already existing IETF_Q_BRIDGE MIB which is based on RFC 2674 (Bridges with Traffic Classes, Multicast Filtering and Virtual LAN Extensions), to accomodate the proprietary behavior of the device and for defining objects as recommended by standards. This MIB comprises proprietary managed objects as well the objects required for conforming to the standards. However, the set of objects defined in this MIB, do not duplicate, nor conflict with any MIB object definitions defined in the IETF_Q_BRIDGE_MIB.

alcatelIND1MVRPMIB.description: This module describes an authoritative enterprise-specific Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) Management Information Base (MIB): For the Birds Of Prey Product Line MVRP for the distribution of VLAN configuration information. The right to make changes in specification and other information contained in this document without prior notice is reserved. MvrpPortVlanRestrictBitmap.name: MvrpPortVlanRestrictBitmap
MvrpPortVlanRestrictBitmap.description: The bitmap that includes the status value for different type of restrictions that could be applied for a port VLAN combination. Each bit in the bitmap corresponds to the status of the restriction applied for a VLAN on a port. Having the bit 'noRestriction(0)' set indicates that the no restriction is applied for the VLAN on the port. No other option can be applied along with this option. Having the bit 'restrictRegistration(1)' set indicates that the VLAN is restricted from getting registered on the port. Having the bit 'restrictAdvertisement(2)' set indicates that the advertisement for the VLAN is restricted on the port. Having the bit 'restrictStaticVlanRegistration(3)' set indicates that the registration on a port for a static VLAN is restricted.

alaMvrpGlobalStatus.name: alaMvrpGlobalStatus
alaMvrpGlobalStatus.description: The administrative global status requested by management for MVRP. The value enabled(1) indicates that MVRP should be enabled on this device. When disabled(2), MVRP is disabled in the system and all MVRP packets will be forwarded transparently if transparent switching status is also enabled. This object affects all MVRP Applicant and Registrar state machines. A transition from disabled(2) to enabled(1) will cause a reset of all MVRP state machines on all ports.

alaMvrpGlobalClearStats.name: alaMvrpGlobalClearStats
alaMvrpGlobalClearStats.description: Defines the global clear statistics control for MVRP. The value reset (1) indicates that MVRP should clear all statistic counters related to all ports in the system. By default, this object contains a zero value.

alaMvrpTransparentSwitching.name: alaMvrpTransparentSwitching
alaMvrpTransparentSwitching.description: Defines the behavior when MVRP is globally disabled on a device. The value enabled (1) indicates that device behaves like a MVRP transparent device and the MVRP frames will be flooded transparently. Value disabled (2) disabled indicates that the device will not flood MVRP frames and will simply discard the received MVRP frames.

alaMvrpMaxVlanLimit.name: alaMvrpMaxVlanLimit
alaMvrpMaxVlanLimit.description: Defines the maximum number of dynamic VLANs that can be created on the system by MVRP. If the number of VLANs created by MVRP reaches this limit, the system will prevent MVRP from creating additional VLANs.

alaMvrpVlanConflictInfo.name: alaMvrpVlanConflictInfo
alaMvrpVlanConflictInfo.description: MVRP has received registration for Vlan which is configured for End To End Flow Control. Notify the Management with the Port in which the MVRP PDU was recieved and the Vlan.

alaVlanRegistrationProtocolType.name: alaVlanRegistrationProtocolType
alaVlanRegistrationProtocolType.description: Defines which VLAN registration mode is running in the system.

alaMvrpVlanLimitReachedEvent.name: alaMvrpVlanLimitReachedEvent
alaMvrpVlanLimitReachedEvent.description: The number of vlans learnt dynamically by MVRP has reached a configured limit. Notify the management entity with number of vlans learnt dynamically by MVRP and the configured MVRP vlan limit.

alaMvrpE2eVlanConflict.name: alaMvrpE2eVlanConflict
alaMvrpE2eVlanConflict.description: MVRP has recieved a registration for Vlan which is configured for End To End Flow Control. Notify the Management with the Port in which the MVRP PDU was recieved and the Vlan.

alaMvrpPortConfigTable.name: alaMvrpPortConfigTable
alaMvrpPortConfigTable.description: A table containing MVRP port configuration information.

alaMvrpPortConfigIfIndex.name: alaMvrpPortConfigIfIndex
alaMvrpPortConfigIfIndex.description: The ifindex of the port on which MVRP is running

alaMvrpPortStatus.name: alaMvrpPortStatus
alaMvrpPortStatus.description: The state of MVRP operation on this port. The value enabled(1) indicates that MVRP is enabled on this port. When disabled(2), MVRP is disabled on this port. Any MVRP packets received will be silently discarded on this port and no MVRP registrations will be propagated from this port. This object affects all MVRP Applicant and Registrar state machines on this port. A transition from disabled(2) to enabled(1) will cause a reset of all MVRP state machines on this port.

alaMvrpPortConfigRegistrarMode.name: alaMvrpPortConfigRegistrarMode
alaMvrpPortConfigRegistrarMode.description: Defines the mode of operation of all the registrar state machines associated to the port. normal - registration as well as de-registration of VLANs are allowed. fixed - A VLAN that was previously mapped onto such a port either dynamically or statically cannot be de-registered through MVRP. When the port registration mode is set to fixed, VLAN(s) can only be mapped onto such port statically. forbidden - dynamic VLAN registration or de-registration are not allowed on the port. NOTE: The registrar state machines for the default VLAN will operate in Fixed Registration Mode for all the ports on the switch.

alaMvrpPortConfigApplicantMode.name: alaMvrpPortConfigApplicantMode
alaMvrpPortConfigApplicantMode.description: Defines the mode of operation of all the applicant state machines associated to the port. participant - The state machines participates normally in MVRP protocol exchanges. nonparticipant - The state machines does not send any MVRP PDU(s). active - The state machines send MVRP frames even on ports that are in blocking state on the active spanning tree instance.

alaMvrpPortConfigJoinTimer.name: alaMvrpPortConfigJoinTimer
alaMvrpPortConfigJoinTimer.description: Maximum period of time that a MVRP instance waits before making declarations for VLANs.

alaMvrpPortConfigLeaveTimer.name: alaMvrpPortConfigLeaveTimer
alaMvrpPortConfigLeaveTimer.description: Period of time that a registrar state machine of a MVRP instance waits, after receiving a leave message on a port for a particular VLAN, to remove the registration of that VLAN on the port. The value for the Leave Timer must be greater than twice the value for the Join timer, plus six times the timer resolution.

alaMvrpPortConfigLeaveAllTimer.name: alaMvrpPortConfigLeaveAllTimer
alaMvrpPortConfigLeaveAllTimer.description: Interval at which the Leave All state machine of a MVRP instance generates Leave All messages. A Leave All message instructs MVRP to modify the state of all VLANs registered on a port to Leaving. The value for the LeaveAll Timer must be greater than the value for the Leave timer.

alaMvrpPortConfigPeriodicTimer.name: alaMvrpPortConfigPeriodicTimer
alaMvrpPortConfigPeriodicTimer.description: Interval at which the Periodic transmission state machine of a MVRP instance generates transmission opportunities for the MVRP instance.

alaMvrpPortConfigPeriodicTransmissionSta.name: alaMvrpPortConfigPeriodicTransmissionStatus
alaMvrpPortConfigPeriodicTransmissionSta.description: Used to enable or disable the Periodic transmission state machine of a MVRP instance.

alaMvrpPortStatsJoinInTransmitted.description: The number of Join In messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsJoinEmptyTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsJoinEmptyTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsJoinEmptyTransmitted.description: The number of Join Empty messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsLeaveTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsLeaveTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsLeaveTransmitted.description: The number of Leave messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsInTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsInTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsInTransmitted.description: The number of In messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsEmptyTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsEmptyTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsEmptyTransmitted.description: The number of Empty messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsLeaveAllTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsLeaveAllTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsLeaveAllTransmitted.description: The number of Leave all messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsTotalPDUReceived.name: alaMvrpPortStatsTotalPDUReceived
alaMvrpPortStatsTotalPDUReceived.description: The total number of MVRP PDUs received.

alaMvrpPortStatsTotalPDUTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsTotalPDUTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsTotalPDUTransmitted.description: The total number of MVRP PDUs transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsTotalMsgsReceived.name: alaMvrpPortStatsTotalMsgsReceived
alaMvrpPortStatsTotalMsgsReceived.description: The total number of MVRP messages received.

alaMvrpPortStatsTotalMsgsTransmitted.name: alaMvrpPortStatsTotalMsgsTransmitted
alaMvrpPortStatsTotalMsgsTransmitted.description: The total number of MVRP messages transmitted.

alaMvrpPortStatsInvalidMsgsReceived.name: alaMvrpPortStatsInvalidMsgsReceived
alaMvrpPortStatsInvalidMsgsReceived.description: The number of Invalid messages received.

alaMvrpPortFailedRegistrations.name: alaMvrpPortFailedRegistrations
alaMvrpPortFailedRegistrations.description: The total number of failed GVRP registrations, for any reason, on this port.

alaMvrpPortLastPduOrigin.name: alaMvrpPortLastPduOrigin
alaMvrpPortLastPduOrigin.description: The Source MAC Address of the last GVRP message received on this port.

alaMvrpPortStatsClearStats.name: alaMvrpPortStatsClearStats
alaMvrpPortStatsClearStats.description: Reset all statistics parameters corresponding to this port. By default, this objects contains a zero value.

alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigTable.name: alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigTable
alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigTable.description: A table containing MVRP port restrict VLAN configuration information.

alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigEntry.name: alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigEntry
alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigEntry.description: A MVRP port restrict VLAN configuration entry.

alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanIfIndex.name: alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanIfIndex
alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanIfIndex.description: The ifindex of the port on which MVRP is running

alaMvrpPortVlanRestrictions.name: alaMvrpPortVlanRestrictions
alaMvrpPortVlanRestrictions.description: The bitmap includes the status value for different type of restrictions that could be applied for a port VLAN combination. Each bit in the bitmap corresponds to the status of a particular restriction applied for a VLAN on the port. If the bit is set, the particular restriction is enabled for the VLAN port combination. Having the bit 'noRestriction(0)' set indicates that the no restriction is applied for the VLAN on the port. No other option can be applied along with this option. Having the bit 'restrictRegistration(1)' set indicates that the VLAN is restricted from getting registered on the port. Having the bit 'restrictAdvertisement(2)' set indicates that the advertisement for the VLAN is restricted on the port. Having the bit 'restrictStaticVlanRegistration(3)' set indicates that the registration on a port for a static VLAN is restricted.

alaMvrpBaseGroup.name: alaMvrpBaseGroup
alaMvrpBaseGroup.description: Collection of objects for management of MVRP Base Group.

alaMvrpPortConfigGroup.name: alaMvrpPortConfigGroup
alaMvrpPortConfigGroup.description: Collection of objects for management of MVRP Port Configuration Table.

alaMvrpPortStatsGroup.name: alaMvrpPortStatsGroup
alaMvrpPortStatsGroup.description: Collection of objects for management of MVRP Statistics Table.

alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigGroup.name: alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigGroup
alaMvrpPortRestrictVlanConfigGroup.description: Collection of objects for management of MVRP Port Restrict VLAN Configuration Table.
